有限使用权、受益权和特许权有限使用权（easement）是指一个人有限使用他人不动产的权利，前提是不从该不动产中获得任何东西。

means.word_mean: 1. (law) the privilege of using something that is not your own (as using another's land as a right of way to your own land)
2. the act of reducing something unpleasant (as pain or annoyance);
